name: P3
description: Display-P3 color space with sRGB transfer function. Wider gamut than sRGB, common on modern Apple displays.

r.description: Red channel (0-1, can exceed for out-of-gamut)

g.description: Green channel (0-1, can exceed for out-of-gamut)

b.description: Blue channel (0-1, can exceed for out-of-gamut)

initializers.title: Display-P3 Color Initializer
initializers.description: Creates a Display-P3 color from 0-1 values

conversions.description: Converts Linear P3 to P3 by applying sRGB transfer function
